title: Suki Waterhouse flashes belly button in crop top and Nike shorts after gym session in West Hollywood
text:
She loves to show off her body.

And on Sunday, Suki Waterhouse proudly flaunted her toned figure as she left a gym in West Hollywood.

The English model and actress, 27, flashed her navel in a cropped white top with red collar and gray Nike shorts.

Fit: She loves to show off her body. And on Sunday, Suki Waterhouse proudly flaunted her toned figure as she left a gym in West Hollywood

She added a cropped jacket and stepped out in purple socks and black trainers.

She carried a large black leather holdall decorated with silver studs.

Her long hair was loose and she sported spectacles and pink lip color.

Waterhouse checked her phone as she stood waiting for her ride.

Gym-honed: Waterhouse, 27, flashed her navel in a cropped white top with red collar and gray Nike shorts. She added a cropped jacket and stepped out in purple socks and black trainers

Casually sporty: The model and actress carried a large black leather holdall decorated with silver studs. Her long hair was loose and she sported spectacles

The London-born model has been focusing on building her acting career.

Earlier this year, she completed filming on the upcoming Alan McGee biopic Creation Stories in which she stars with Rupert Everett and Jason Isaacs.

Directed by Mick Moran, the film tells the story of Creation Records founder McGee and his work with bands such as Oasis, My Bloody Valentine, Ride and Primal Scream.

She's also been linked romantically with Robert Pattinson, who's set to star as the Dark Knight in The Batman.

She and the actor, 33, have been seen out and about together on and off over the past year.
description: She added a black and white leather jacket and stepped out in purple socks and black trainers. Her long hair was loose and she sported spectacles.
